name: Boosty Bot
storyline: A little robot called Boosty Bot is flying along, minding their own business until mysterious cog-shaped robots begin to fly towards him; they are called the Rotabots, and they are not looking where they are going! It’s up to the player to guide Boosty Bot through the waves of Rotabots.
summary: This game is about a cute little robot who is minding his business until mysterious cog-shaped robots begin to fly towards him. It’s the Rotabots! They are not looking where they are going! It’s up to you to guide your little robot friend through the sudden Rotabot incursion!
